name: Darting Duplicate
text: An illusory duplicate of you steps clumsily into an adjacent square, presenting a tempting target before winking out of existence. Any creature that threatens that square must succeed at a Will save or make an attack of opportunity against the image. The image’s AC is equal to 10 + 1/2 your caster level, but as a figment, the image is unaffected by any attack.
effect_zh: 施法者自己的视觉幻象
text_zh: 你在移动过程中一个幻象复制品出现在一个邻接的区域，在眨眼之间显露在目标眼前吸引注意力。然后威胁幻象所在区域的生物都必须通过意志豁免检定，失败则会对幻象进行借机攻击。幻象的AC=10+1/2施法者等级，但作为一个虚假幻觉，幻象不会受到任何攻击影响。
